item.description:
Dr. Brian Clement, author, international lecturer & director of the renowned Hippocrates health Institute, will speak on CHANGE YOUR LIFESTYLE, SAVE YOUR LIFE; HOW TO PREVENT AGING AND HEAL DISEASE.

Come and learn how changing the lifestyle and living on living foods abundant energy and extraordinary nutrition protects cells from early death, promoting life extension. Dr. Clement will explain how each of us can lengthen our life span and increase the quality of our health and well-being. His extensive clinical research as Director of Hippocrates Health Institute affords him a private understanding of how all people can prevent premature aging, disease and resulting unhappiness.

COME AND BE MOTIVATED TO CHANGE YOUR LIFE!

TUESDAY, SEPTEMBER 21, 2010 5:30 -9:30 PM
UNITED METHODIST CHURCH, 430 WALNUT ST., NEWTONVILLE

For directions and more details
go to www.OptimumHealthSolution.org

To reserve your front seat until 6 pm, click here to buy Admission Tickets for $15. At door tickets are $20.

If you are unable to bring an organic, unprocessed, raw vegan dish with recipe and utensils for 8 people, buy a meal ticket online for $10.

Questions: call Betsy Bragg 781-899-6664 or cell 617-835-2913 or email: Betsy@OptimumHealthSolution.org.

Directions to new Dinner Speaker Location - United Methodist Church in Newtonville

Location

Fellowship Hall (Ground Floor) The United Methodist Church of Newton (Across from Newton North High School) 430 Walnut Street, Newtonville MA 02460 - Handicapped Accessible - Plenty of parking available

Public Transportation

15 minute walk from the Newton Highlands MBTA stop on the Riverside D section of green line, arriving on the East Side of Newtonville.. If you do not want to walk, you can take the #59 bus that stops at that station.

Driving Directions

http://www.gbgm-umc.o...
item.name: BRIAN CLEMENT
